name: GSDP Per Capita
description: Gross State Domestic Product divided by population. Reflects the average economic output per person — a key indicator of relative prosperity.

name: GSDP Growth Rate
description: Year-over-year percentage change in Gross State Domestic Product at constant prices. Indicates the pace of economic expansion.

name: GSDP (Absolute)
description: Total Gross State Domestic Product in crore rupees. Measures the overall size of a state's economy.

name: Agriculture Sector Share of GSDP
description: Percentage of state GDP contributed by agriculture and allied activities. A higher share often signals lower structural economic diversification.

name: Industry Sector Share of GSDP
description: Percentage of state GDP from manufacturing, mining, and construction. Indicates the degree of industrialization.

name: Services Sector Share of GSDP
description: Percentage of state GDP from services such as IT, finance, and trade. A higher share typically reflects a more mature economy.

name: Poverty Headcount Ratio
description: Share of the population below the national multidimensional poverty line. A composite measure covering health, education, and living standards.

name: Fiscal Deficit as % of GSDP
description: Gap between state government revenue and expenditure as a share of GSDP. A key indicator of fiscal health and borrowing dependence.

name: State Debt to GSDP Ratio
description: Outstanding state government liabilities as a percentage of GSDP. Higher ratios signal greater debt burden and fiscal risk.

name: Own Tax Revenue as % of GSDP
description: Tax revenue raised by the state from its own sources as a share of GSDP. Reflects fiscal self-reliance and tax administration capacity.

name: Capital Expenditure as % of Total Expenditure
description: Share of government spending directed toward asset creation like roads and buildings. Higher ratios indicate greater investment in long-term infrastructure.

name: GST Collection Per Capita
description: Goods and Services Tax collected per person. Reflects consumption levels and the formalization of a state's economy.

name: Credit-Deposit Ratio
description: Ratio of bank loans disbursed to deposits held in a state. A higher ratio indicates greater local credit deployment and economic activity.

name: Rural Per Capita Consumption Expenditure
description: Average monthly household spending per person in rural areas. Based on rural MPCE from the Household Consumption Expenditure Survey 2022-23.

name: Labour Force Participation Rate (Total)
description: Percentage of the working-age population either employed or actively seeking work. A fundamental measure of labour market engagement.

name: Female Labour Force Participation Rate
description: Share of working-age women who are employed or seeking employment. A critical indicator of women's economic empowerment.

name: Unemployment Rate
description: Percentage of the labour force that is without work but actively seeking employment. A core measure of job scarcity.

name: Youth Unemployment Rate (15-29)
description: Unemployment rate among persons aged 15-29. High youth unemployment signals a mismatch between education output and job availability.

name: Regular Salaried Workers Share
description: Proportion of workers in regular wage or salaried employment. Higher shares indicate more stable and formal job markets.

name: Average Daily Wage (Casual)
description: Mean daily earnings for casual labourers. Reflects wage levels for the most vulnerable segment of the workforce.

name: Worker Population Ratio
description: Percentage of the working-age population that is currently employed. Measures the economy's ability to generate jobs.

name: Average Monthly Earnings (Regular)
description: Mean monthly income for regular salaried workers. Indicates earning levels in the formal and semi-formal employment sector.

name: Self-Employment Share
description: Percentage of workforce that is self-employed. High self-employment often indicates limited formal job opportunities.

name: Consumer Price Index (General)
description: Weighted average price level of a basket of consumer goods and services. Higher values relative to base year indicate greater inflation pressure.

name: Average CPI Inflation (10yr)
description: Average annual CPI inflation rate over 2014-2024. Lower inflation means more stable prices for consumers.

name: Number of Registered Factories
description: Count of factories registered under the Factories Act. Indicates the scale of organized manufacturing in the state.

name: Factory Workers (Total)
description: Total number of workers employed in registered factories. Reflects the state's industrial employment capacity.

name: Factory Gross Value Added
description: Value added by registered factories (output minus input costs). Measures the industrial sector's contribution to the economy.

name: Unorganised Manufacturing Enterprises
description: Total number of unincorporated manufacturing establishments. Indicates the scale of informal manufacturing activity.

name: Literacy Rate (Total)
description: Percentage of population aged 7+ that can read and write. A foundational indicator of educational attainment.

name: Gross Enrollment Ratio (Secondary)
description: Total secondary school enrollment as a percentage of the eligible age group population. Measures access to secondary education.

name: Gross Enrollment Ratio (Higher Education)
description: Enrollment in higher education as a share of the 18-23 age group. Reflects access to colleges and universities.

name: Pupil-Teacher Ratio (Elementary)
description: Number of students per teacher at the elementary level. Lower ratios indicate better teacher availability and classroom attention.

name: Female Literacy Rate
description: Percentage of women aged 7+ who can read and write. A key measure of gender equity in education.

name: Graduates in Workforce
description: Percentage of workers with a graduate degree or higher. Indicates human capital quality in the labour force.

name: Infant Mortality Rate
description: Number of infant deaths per 1,000 live births before age one. A core indicator of healthcare access and maternal-child health outcomes.

name: Maternal Mortality Ratio
description: Number of maternal deaths per 100,000 live births. Reflects the quality of obstetric care and women's health services.

name: Life Expectancy at Birth
description: Average number of years a newborn is expected to live. A summary measure of overall population health and living conditions.

name: Stunting Prevalence (Children <5)
description: Percentage of children under 5 who are too short for their age. Indicates chronic malnutrition and poor early childhood conditions.

name: Institutional Delivery Rate
description: Percentage of births taking place in a health facility. Higher rates reduce maternal and neonatal mortality risks.

name: Hospital Beds per 1000 Population
description: Number of hospital beds available per 1,000 people. Measures the capacity of a state's healthcare infrastructure.

name: Anaemia Prevalence (Women 15-49)
description: Percentage of women aged 15-49 with haemoglobin below 12 g/dl. A key indicator of nutritional deficiency affecting maternal and child health.

name: Crude Death Rate
description: Deaths per 1,000 population across all age groups. A basic measure of population health outcomes.

name: Malaria Incidence
description: New malaria cases per 100,000 population. Measures the burden of malaria disease across states.

name: Non-Vegetarian Consumption
description: Share of adults (15-49) who consume egg, fish, chicken or meat. Indicates dietary diversity and protein intake.

name: Female Labour Force Participation Rate
description: Share of working-age women who are employed or seeking employment. A critical indicator of women's economic empowerment.

name: Sex Ratio at Birth
description: Number of females born per 1,000 males. Deviations from the natural ratio indicate sex-selective practices.

name: Women Elected Representatives (%)
description: Percentage of elected state legislators who are women. Measures women's political representation in governance.

name: Crimes Against Women Rate
description: Reported crimes against women per 100,000 female population. Reflects both the prevalence of gender-based violence and reporting rates.

name: Women in Manufacturing
description: Share of women in the manufacturing workforce.

name: Child Marriage Rate (Women 20-24 married before 18)
description: Percentage of women aged 20-24 who were married before age 18. A measure of early marriage prevalence and its impact on girls' development.

name: Child Labour Rate (5-14 years)
description: Percentage of children aged 5-14 engaged in labour. Indicates the extent to which children are denied education and childhood.

name: Under-5 Mortality Rate
description: Deaths of children under age 5 per 1,000 live births. Captures the combined effect of nutrition, sanitation, and healthcare access.

name: Full Immunization Coverage (12-23 months)
description: Percentage of children aged 12-23 months who received all basic vaccinations. Measures the reach and effectiveness of public immunization programs.

name: Anaemia Prevalence (Children 6-59m)
description: Percentage of children aged 6-59 months with haemoglobin below 11 g/dl. Childhood anaemia impairs cognitive development and physical growth.

name: Old-Age Dependency Ratio
description: Ratio of population aged 60+ to the working-age population (15-59). Higher values indicate greater economic burden on the workforce.

name: Pension Coverage (60+)
description: Share of elderly persons receiving pension benefits. Indicates the extent of social security coverage for senior citizens.

name: Life Expectancy at Age 60
description: Average remaining years of life for a person who has reached age 60. Reflects elderly healthcare quality and living conditions.

name: Food Grain Production Per Capita
description: Total food grain output divided by state population. Measures agricultural productivity and food self-sufficiency.

name: Gross Irrigated Area as % of Cropped Area
description: Share of cultivated land with access to irrigation. Higher irrigation coverage reduces dependence on rainfall and improves crop yields.

name: Crop Insurance Coverage
description: Percentage of cropped area covered under the PM Fasal Bima Yojana. Measures farmer access to risk mitigation against crop loss.

name: Average Monthly Farm Household Income
description: Mean monthly income of agricultural households from all sources. A direct measure of farmer economic well-being.

name: Road Density
description: Total road length per 100 square kilometres of area. Indicates the physical connectivity and transport infrastructure of a state.

name: Rural Road Connectivity (PMGSY)
description: Percentage of eligible rural habitations connected by all-weather roads under PMGSY. Critical for rural access to markets and services.

name: Households with Tap Water Connection
description: Share of rural households with a functional tap water connection under Jal Jeevan Mission. Measures access to safe drinking water.

name: Household Electrification Rate
description: Percentage of households with an electricity connection. A basic measure of energy access and infrastructure reach.

name: Rural Piped Water Access
description: Percentage of rural households with piped water as principal drinking water source.

name: Durable Housing
description: Percentage of households living in fully durable houses (durable roof, wall, and floor materials).

name: TV Ownership
description: Percentage of households owning a television.

name: Refrigerator Ownership
description: Percentage of households owning a refrigerator.

name: Washing Machine Ownership
description: Percentage of households owning a washing machine.

name: Renewable Energy Share of Installed Capacity
description: Percentage of total installed power capacity from renewable sources like solar, wind, and biomass. Measures progress in energy transition.

name: Forest Cover as % of Geographical Area
description: Share of a state's land area under forest cover as assessed by satellite imagery. Critical for biodiversity and climate resilience.

name: Per Capita Electricity Consumption
description: Total electricity consumed divided by population. Reflects both industrial activity and household energy access.

name: Annual Average PM2.5 Concentration
description: Average concentration of fine particulate matter (PM2.5) in the air. Lower values indicate better air quality and reduced health risks.

name: Total Cognizable Crime Rate
description: Total cognizable crimes reported per 100,000 population. A broad measure of law and order conditions in a state.

name: Murder Rate
description: Reported murders per 100,000 population. One of the most reliable crime statistics due to high reporting rates.

name: Police Personnel per 100000 Population
description: Number of police personnel per 100,000 people. Indicates the state's capacity to maintain law enforcement and public safety.

name: Chargesheet Filing Rate
description: Percentage of investigated cases in which a chargesheet was filed. Reflects the efficiency and thoroughness of police investigations.

name: Voter Turnout (Last Assembly Election)
description: Percentage of eligible voters who cast their ballot in the last state assembly election. A measure of democratic participation.

name: Ease of Doing Business Score
description: Score based on implementation of business reform action points by state governments. Higher scores indicate a more business-friendly regulatory environment.

name: PDS Coverage (NFSA Beneficiaries)
description: Percentage of the population covered under the National Food Security Act's public distribution system. Measures food security programme reach.

name: Bank Branches per 100000 Population
description: Number of scheduled commercial bank branches per 100,000 people. Indicates physical access to formal banking services.

name: Jan Dhan Accounts per 1000 Adults
description: Number of Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana accounts per 1,000 adults. Measures the penetration of basic banking among unbanked populations.

name: Digital Payment Transactions Per Capita
description: Number of digital payment transactions (UPI, NEFT, etc.) per person. Indicates adoption of cashless financial services.

name: Women Bank Account Holders
description: Percentage of adult women (18+) who have a bank account. Measures gender gap in financial access.

name: National Games Medal Tally (per million pop.)
description: Medals won at the National Games normalized by state population. Reflects athletic talent development and sports investment.

name: Sports Stadiums and Complexes per Million
description: Number of sports stadiums and complexes per million population. Indicates the availability of organized sports infrastructure.

name: Fit India School Certification Rate
description: Percentage of schools certified under the Fit India School programme. Measures institutional commitment to physical fitness in education.

name: Domestic Tourist Visits Per Capita
description: Number of domestic tourist visits divided by state population. Reflects the attractiveness and tourism infrastructure of a state.

name: Foreign Tourist Visits
description: Total number of foreign tourist arrivals to the state. Indicates international appeal and tourism competitiveness.

name: ASI-Protected Heritage Sites
description: Number of monuments and sites protected by the Archaeological Survey of India. Reflects the state's historical and cultural heritage density.

name: Urbanization Rate
description: Percentage of the state population living in urban areas. Higher urbanization generally correlates with greater economic opportunity.

name: Population Density
description: Number of persons per square kilometre. Very high density strains infrastructure while very low density limits service delivery.

name: Decadal Population Growth Rate
description: Percentage increase in population over the last census decade. Faster growth can strain resources; slower growth signals demographic transition.

name: Total Fertility Rate
description: Average number of children a woman would have over her lifetime at current age-specific fertility rates. Below 2.1 indicates sub-replacement fertility.

name: Internet Subscribers per 100 Population
description: Number of internet connections per 100 people. Measures digital connectivity and access to online services.

name: Broadband Subscribers per 100 Population
description: Number of broadband connections per 100 people. Indicates access to high-speed internet needed for modern services and remote work.

name: Recognized Startups per Million Population
description: DPIIT-recognized startups per million people. Reflects the entrepreneurial ecosystem and innovation capacity of a state.

name: Computer Literacy
description: Percentage of adults able to use a computer.

name: ICT Skills (Messaging)
description: Percentage of adults able to send messages via email or messaging services. Proxy for basic digital literacy.

name: Internet Banking Usage
description: Percentage of adults who do internet banking.

name: Registered Motor Vehicles per 1000 Population
description: Number of registered motor vehicles per 1,000 people. Indicates personal mobility levels and economic activity.

name: Road Accident Fatalities per 100000 Population
description: Deaths from road accidents per 100,000 people. Measures road safety conditions, enforcement, and trauma care capacity.

name: National Highway Length per 1000 sq km
description: Length of national highways per 1,000 sq km of area. Reflects the reach of the high-speed road network across a state.

name: Two-Wheeler Ownership
description: Percentage of households owning a two-wheeler (motorcycle/scooter).

name: Car Ownership
description: Percentage of households owning a four-wheeler (car/jeep).

name: Road Accident Deaths Per Lakh
description: Number of road accident fatalities per lakh (100,000) population. A key road safety indicator.

name: Newspaper Circulation per 1000 Population
description: Registered newspaper copies circulated per 1,000 people. Indicates print media penetration and public engagement with news.

name: TV-Owning Households
description: Percentage of households owning a television set. Measures access to broadcast media and information.

name: Inter-State Migration Rate
description: Percentage of residents who migrated from another state. Reflects labour mobility and a state's pull as an economic destination.

name: Domestic Remittances as % of GSDP
description: Value of money sent home by migrant workers as a share of state GDP. Indicates economic dependence on out-migration.

name: Registered NGOs per 100000 Population
description: Number of registered non-governmental organizations per 100,000 people. Measures civic engagement and civil society strength.

name: Cooperative Societies per 100000 Population
description: Number of registered cooperative societies per 100,000 people. Reflects the tradition and strength of community-based economic organization.

name: Swachh Survekshan Average City Score
description: Average score of a state's cities in the national cleanliness survey. Measures urban sanitation, waste management, and citizen engagement.

name: Urban Household Sanitation Coverage
description: Percentage of urban households with access to toilets under Swachh Bharat Mission. Measures progress toward eliminating open defecation.

name: Municipal Solid Waste Processing Rate
description: Percentage of municipal solid waste that is processed or treated. Measures urban waste management effectiveness and environmental compliance.

name: Suicide Rate
description: Reported suicides per 100,000 population. A critical indicator of mental health crisis prevalence and psychosocial distress.

name: Psychiatrists per 100000 Population
description: Number of psychiatrists per 100,000 people. Measures the availability of specialized mental healthcare professionals.

name: District Mental Health Programme Coverage
description: Percentage of districts covered under the District Mental Health Programme. Indicates geographic reach of public mental health services.

name: Disability Prevalence Rate
description: Percentage of the population with one or more disabilities. Used for planning inclusive policies and estimating service needs.

name: Disability Employment Rate
description: Share of persons with disabilities who are employed. Measures economic inclusion and workplace accessibility for disabled persons.

name: Government Buildings with Accessibility Features
description: Percentage of government buildings with ramps, lifts, and other accessibility features. Indicates compliance with disability access mandates.

name: Wireless Subscribers per 100 Population
description: Number of mobile phone subscriptions per 100 people. Measures the reach of wireless communication across the state.

name: Telecom Tower Density
description: Number of telecom towers per 100 sq km. Indicates the physical infrastructure supporting mobile and data connectivity.

name: Average Monthly Data Usage per Subscriber
description: Mean monthly mobile data consumption per subscriber in gigabytes. Reflects digital literacy and the shift toward data-driven services.
